body:
Brief synopsis (First story):
A man knocks up his young daughter. She has a Son.
The Mother is a shotocon & accidentally becomes pregnant. The Mother has a Daughter this time.
Daughter is raised normally, thinks older brother is just her brother. There is mutual sexual attraction between brother/father & sister/daughter but try to fight it, poorly. (Precocious puberty runs in the family, I guess.)
Sister gets caught masturbating, brother goes "fuck it", jumps his sister (and does). 
Brother confesses he's his sister's father in the middle of coitus. Sister is overjoyed she has a father. Brother/sister sex scene turns into father/daughter sex scene mid-stroke. Mother sees her children in the act, but turns a blind eye.
Daughter is aspiring Idol.
Some shit goes down.
Daughter enters a local talent show. For some reason father confronts daughter on stage. Proceeds to have a live sex show in front of audience, letting all know they're brother/sister & father/daughter. 
Happy ending.
